thread.section_title: Lady Gaga Pictures, Songs, Videos and Album Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: releases clip for new music video John Wayne
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga releases clip for new music video John Wayne | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: releases clip for new music video John Wayne
text:
She's on a roll after her super successful Super Bowl halftime show.
And Lady Gaga is capitalizing on the success with a string of professional announcements.
On Wednesday the 30-year-old Poker Face singer introduced her new video for her hit John Wayne now available exclusively on Apple Music.
New music! Lady Gaga, 30, introduced her John Wayne new video now available exclusively on Apple Music on Wednesday
It's got everything! The latest hit from the Joanne album is full of Gaga's signature dance moves, with a few elements of country throw into the mix
'Iâ€™M STRUNG OUT ON #JOHNWAYNE! Surprise! Next #JOANNE music video out now exclusively on @AppleMusic #GagaJohnWayne,' she wrote on social media.
The latest hit from the Joanne album is full of Gaga's signature dance moves, with a few elements of country throw into the mix.
The song, inspired by famous country-western actor John Wayne, is an ode to country music in a way Lady Gaga fans will appreciate.
In the clip, the pop star clearly sticks to her dance-style roots, but throws in some leather, a cowboy hat and motorcycle to bring out the country theme.
It's still Gaga! The song, inspired by famous country-western actor John Wayne, is an ode to country music in a way Lady Gaga fans will appreciate
Daredevil! The video features Gaga doing a few impressive tricks on the fast-moving motorcycle
The clip begins with a quick montage showing Gaga wearing a black cowboy hat while riding a motorcycle, before cutting to a scene of her dancing with a group of backup dancers in Daisy duke shorts, a silver glittery bra and red leather jacket.
The video basically cuts between the two different shots, with the daredevil performer showing off some impressive stunts on the bike.
This isn't the first time we have seen or heard her latest hit.
Fierce! The Poker Face singer looks great in a red leather jacket in her new video
It then cuts to a scene of her dancing with a group of backup dancers in Daisy duke shorts, a silver glittery bra and red leather jacket
We've heard it before! The talented singer-songwriter performed John Wayne during the Victoria Secret Fashion show in December
The talented singer-songwriter performed John Wayne during the Victoria Secret Fashion show in December and also had the track as part of her set list during her Dive Bar mini tour last year.
Fans will more than likely hear a lot more of the banger song on Gaga's new world tour.
Fresh off the heels of her performance during the second most-watched halftime show of all time on Sunday (second to Katy Perry in 2016), the Born This Way songstress announced the Joanne world tour with dates in North America, Europe and South America in 2017.
She's hitting the road: The Born This Way songstress announced the Joanne world tour with dates in North America, Europe and South America in 2017
Gaga performed a 13-minute medley of her hits including Born This Way, Poker Face, Telephone and Million Reasons and afterwards, on Sunday night, her sales numbers went through the roof.
People reported Monday that, according to Nielsen Music, Gaga sold about 150,000 digital albums and songs in the U.S. - that's up more than 1,000 percent compared to sales on Saturday.
Sales of her six albums also jumped, hitting more than 23,000 downloads on Sunday, an increase of 1,395 percent from the day before.
Good for business: When Gaga performed a 13-minute medley of her hits on Sunday night, her sales numbers went through the roof
Record-breaking: Her half time show was the second most-watched Super Bowl halftime show in history
It's a theme! The singer chose to wear a country getup on the same day she announced her country-inspired new music video John Wayne
